title: S4 Ep164: Why Now, Why This Tone-Deaf Initiative?: Friday, September 17, 2021
itunes:title: Why Now, Why This Tone-Deaf Initiative?: Friday, September 17, 2021
description:
• Simone Biles Gives Emotional Testimony at Senate Hearing on FBI's Handling of Nassar Investigation (PEOPLE)
  • Bethenny Frankel claims Tom Girardi owed her late ex Dennis Shields $500K (Page Six)
  • Prince Philip's Will to Remain Secret for at Least 90 Years to Protect 'Dignity' of Queen Elizabeth (PEOPLE)
  • The Activist Shifting to Documentary Special at CBS amid Backlash to Competition Format (PEOPLE)
  • SpaceX launches all-civilian crew on Inspiration4 mission (CBS News)
